TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 仅当调用方法时，事件才会发生 。The event can occur only when you call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的 事件 打印在调用 类的方法时遇到的未知 XML 节点的各种属性 。The following example uses the event of the to print various properties of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalName As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的 XML 本地名称。

span.span: Gets the XML local name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 正在被反序列化的节点的 XML 本地名称。

span.span: The XML local name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回本地名称 (也称为 XML 限定名称的本地部分) 。The property returns the local name (also known as a local part) of an XML qualified name. 属性符合 1999 http://www.w3.org 规范 `Namespaces in XML` 。The property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`. ## Examples 下面的示例输出 在调用 类的方法时遇到的未知 XML 节点的 。The following example prints the of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the class's method. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 正在被反序列化的节点的名称。

span.span: The name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将打印导致事件发生的未知节点的名称 。The following example prints the name of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取与正在被反序列化的 XML 节点关联的命名空间 URI。

span.span: Gets the namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 与正在被反序列化的 XML 节点关联的命名空间 URI。

span.span: The namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例输出导致事件发生的未知 XML 节点的 URI 。The following example prints the URI of the unknown XML node that caused the event to occur. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the XML node being deserialized.

value.span: 表示正在被反序列化的 XML 节点的 。

span.span: The that represents the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举返回正在反序列化的节点的说明。The enumeration returns a description of the node being deserialized. 例如，如果节点是注释，它将返回 "Comment"。For example, it returns "Comment" if the node is a comment. ## Examples 下面的示例输出了导致事件发生的未知节点的说明 。The following example prints a description of the unknown node that caused the event to occur. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
